item.title: VF5-Pai
item.description:
Bokutai
Meishousho B123
Hakkeshou

Can reversal any? high with B12, any mid with DB12
Any move that goes to *BOKUTAI*, do 12> DF1,1,F1 (x2), OR just 2 for a sweep


Cond

1,1,1(DForUF) HAKKESHOU
1,1,1,2 knocks, U1 once theyre on the ground
1,1,1,D2 low sweeps, U1 after
1,1,B1,2,2 neat string
1,1,2,2 DF2,1,1 after
1,2, (D) BOKUTAI after> 12, DF1,1,F1, DF1,1
QCF1 approach
BB1 BACKTURN 2 after is mid, D2 after is sweep, any normal jabstring works
DF1(B) BOKUTAI low
DF1,1(DForUF) HAKKESHOU lowhigh into stancewalk
DF1,1,F1 launch, combos into itself
DF1,1,1,2
2,2 cool double kick
F2,1(DForUF) HAKKESHOU
F2,1,2 knocks
F2,1,D2 low mix
B2(D) BOKUTAI
BF2,2 combos into itself once
D2,2 lowhigh
DF2,1,1
UF2,2 really fast jumping mid, hitconfirmable so you can just do UF2 and be annoying
UB2 these usually have fucked up hitboxes
FF12(B) BOKUTAI approaching low
BF12 big crumple
D12(B) BOKUTAI
D12,2,1
FF23 BACKTURN 2 after is mid, D2 after is sweep, any normal jabstring works
FF1,2 launcher
